00022 #include <exception>
00023 #include <string>
00024 
00025 namespace mprace {
00026 
00034 class Exception : public std::exception {
00035 public:
00036 
00040         enum Types {
00041                 UNKNOWN,                                //**< Unknown exception.
00042                 KERNEL_ALLOC_FAILED,    //**< Kernel allocation failed.
00043                 USER_MMAP_FAILED,               //**< UserMemory mmap failed.
00044                 INTERRUPT_FAILED,               //**< Interrupt failed.
00045                 NOT_OPEN,                               //**< Device not open.
00046                 FILE_NOT_FOUND,                 //**< File Not Found.
00047                 UNKNOWN_FILE_FORMAT,    //**< Unknown File Format.
00048                 DMA_NOT_SUPPORTED,              //**< DMA is not supported.
00049                 INVALID_FPGA_NUMBER,    //**< Invalid FPGA number.
00050                 ADDRESS_OUT_OF_RANGE,   //**< Address out of range.
00051                 HUGEPAGES_OPEN_FAILED,  //**< Huge Pages open failed.
00052                 HUGEPAGES_MMAP_FAILED   //**< Huge Pages mmap failed.
00053          };
00054         
00055         const static char* descriptions[];
00056         
00057         
00063         Exception(Types t) : type(t), param(0) {}
00064 
00071         Exception(Types t, int p) : type(t), param(p) {}
00072         
00077         Types getType() { return type; }
00078 
00083         int getParameter() { return param; }
00084         
00088          virtual const char* what() const throw() {
00089                 return descriptions[type];
00090          }
00091         
00092 private:
00096         Types type;
00097         int param;
00098 }; /* class Exception */
00099 
00100 } /* namespace mprace */
00101 
00102 #endif /*MPRACE_EXCEPTION_H_*/
